text.tspan: According to a report by CipherTrace, cryptocurrency
Scams Took in More Than $4 Billion in 2019. And BBB
report found an average dollar loss in crypto-focused
fraud of $3,000 for victims age 25 to 44.
For example, you click on a link
that looks like a legitimate site,
but attackers have created a fake
URL with a zero in it instead of a
course, isn't taking you to the
ROI's in exchange for an original
quickly find these fake apps and
